tests.test_body:
define i1 @test_non_dedicated_exit(i16 %n) {
entry:
  %cond = icmp slt i16 %n, 1
  br i1 %cond, label %exit, label %loop.preheader

loop.preheader:                                   ; preds = %entry
  %sub = add nsw i16 %n, -1
  %ext = zext nneg i16 %sub to i32
  br label %loop

loop:                                             ; preds = %loop.latch, %loop.preheader
  %indvar = phi i32 [ %indvar.inc, %loop.latch ], [ 0, %loop.preheader ]
  %exitcond = icmp eq i32 %indvar, %ext
  br i1 %exitcond, label %exit, label %loop.latch

loop.latch:                                       ; preds = %loop
  %indvar.inc = add nuw nsw i32 %indvar, 1
  br label %loop

exit:                                             ; preds = %loop, %entry
  %cmp = icmp sgt i16 %n, 0
  ret i1 %cmp
}

issue.title: [clang] Miscompile at O3 with SIGKILL
issue.author: cardigan1008

comments.author: dtcxzyw
comments.body:
Reproducer: https://alive2.llvm.org/ce/z/fLN5gw
```
; bin/opt -passes=constraint-elimination test.ll -S
define i1 @test(i16 %n) {
entry:
  %cond = icmp slt i16 %n, 1
  br i1 %cond, label %exit, label %loop.preheader

loop.preheader:
  %sub = add nsw i16 %n, -1
  %ext = zext nneg i16 %sub to i32
  br label %loop

loop:
  %indvar = phi i32 [ %indvar.inc, %loop.latch ], [ 0, %loop.preheader ]
  %12 = icmp eq i32 %indvar, %ext
  br i1 %12, label %exit, label %loop.latch

loop.latch:
  %indvar.inc = add nuw nsw i32 %indvar, 1
  br label %loop

exit:
  %cmp = icmp sgt i16 %n, 0
  ret i1 %cmp
}

```
I will post a fix later.
